snippet: After a drastic realignment and a season of change under Commissioner Val Ackerman, the conference headed into its tournament that begins Wednesday at Madison Square Garden.
abstract: Big East NCAA conference, following year of drastic realignment, is still being polished on the eve of the Big East tournament; commissioner Val Ackerman, who had to start from square one after departure of seven Catholic universities, has been setting up offices, lining up sponsors and spearheading new advertising campaign.
lead_paragraph: After a drastic realignment and a season of change under Commissioner Val Ackerman, the conference headed into its tournament that begins Wednesday at Madison Square Garden.

headline.main: The New Big East: In Spartan Offices, an Ornate Vision
headline.print_headline: The New Big East: in Spartan Offices, an Ornate Vision
